#DYK? #COVID19 variants are not created or caused by vaccines.

Virus variants are created through the natural process of mutation (change). The best way to slow the emergence of new variants is to reduce the spread of infection.

We're concerned about a false sense of security that vaccines have ended the #COVID19 pandemic. Vaccines save lives, but they do not fully prevent transmission. So please be careful and:
Wear a mask. 
Keep distance.
